item.title: MongoDB - Note
item.description: MongoDB - Note MongoDB Wiki 1st. Install It support Linux, Mac OS X, Windows Install MongoDB 2nd. Getting Started Getting Started with MongoDB In Mac, if show message ** WARNING: soft rlimits too low. Number of files is 256, should be at least 1000 input command launchctl limit maxfiles 1024 1024 Refer
